MathUtils Module¶

MathUtils Class¶

class mathUtils.MathUtils.MathUtils[source]¶

Bases: builtins.object

This class contains static methods used in order to build your AI

static getDirection(direction: mathUtils.Vector2.Vector2) → mathUtils.Direction.Direction[source]¶

Takes a direction vector and turn it into a Direction Enum case. :param direction: :rtype: Direction

static getDirectionFromPositions(fromPosition: mathUtils.Vector2.Vector2, toPosition: mathUtils.Vector2.Vector2) → mathUtils.Direction.Direction[source]¶

Takes two vector representing positions and turns them into a direction instruction :type fromPosition: Vector2 :type toPosition: Vector2 :rtype: Direction

static getDirectionVector(fromPosition: mathUtils.Vector2.Vector2, toPosition: mathUtils.Vector2.Vector2) → mathUtils.Vector2.Vector2[source]¶

Takes two vector representing positions and turns them into a direction vector :type fromPosition: Vector2 :type toPosition: Vector2 :rtype: Vector2
